_header: Lief love my love no longer it like

Banna.First Lines:
LEif luve my luve no langar thow it lykAlter ȝour amouris into
                    obserwans…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Repent in tyme devoyd the of this laidAnd knaw in hell thair
                    is Eternall pane
Banna.Note:
Beginning of another work, ‘Voluptouss ly’, written and
                    deleted preceding first line.
